translations: 高举；赞扬；使激动（exalt 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: My faithful love will be with him, and through my name his horn will be exalted.
sentences.translation: 我忠诚的爱与他同在，因我的名，他的角必被高举。

sentences.sentence: I felt exalted and newly alive.
sentences.translation: 我感到兴高采烈，充满新的活力。

sentences.sentence: You're moving in very exalted circles!
sentences.translation: 你这是出入于显贵要人的圈子呀！
